title: Orderbrush Replica
paragraphs: The Orderbrush Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3.
The Orderbrush Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Octobrush, containing only white and gray colors.
The Orderbrush Replica comes with Suction Bombs and Zipcaster. The Orderbrush Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Octobrush.
To unlock the Orderbrush Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Sheldon's Palette.
Reaching certain Freshness levels with the Orderbrush Replica will reward the player with special badges that they can use on their Splashtag.
For competitive tips about the Orderbrush Replica
Note: The strategy advice for Octobrush also applies to Orderbrush Replica, and because of this, they share the same strategy page.
